## macOS Scripts Workspace Setup

This workspace is designed for macOS shell scripting, automation, and system administration tasks.

### Project Focus
- Shell scripting (bash, zsh)
- macOS automation and system administration
- Command-line utilities
- System configuration scripts
- macOS-specific development tools

### Coding Standards
- Use proper shell scripting best practices
- Include proper error handling and validation
- Add comprehensive comments and documentation
- Follow macOS conventions for file paths and system integration
- Test scripts thoroughly before deployment
